SELECT case tender_number.client when '0' then 'PC' when '1' then '微官网' when '2' then 'Android' when '3' then 'iOS' when '4' then '其他' end source_name, 0 AS access_number, tender_number.tender_number, recharge_price.recharge_price, IF(hzt_tender_price.amount IS null,0, hzt_tender_price.amount) + IF(hxf_tender_price.amount IS null,0,hxf_tender_price.amount) + IF(htl_tender_price.amount IS null,0,htl_tender_price.amount) + IF(htj_tender_price.amount IS NULL,0,htj_tender_price.amount) + IF(hjh_tender_price.amount IS NULL,0,hjh_tender_price.amount) + IF(hzr_tender_price.amount IS NULL,0,hzr_tender_price.amount) AS tender_price, hzt_tender_price.amount AS hzt_tender_price, hxf_tender_price.amount AS hxf_tender_price, htl_tender_price.amount AS htl_tender_price, htj_tender_price.amount AS htj_tender_price, hjh_tender_price.amount AS hjh_tender_price, hzr_tender_price.amount AS hzr_tender_price FROM ( SELECT t.client AS client, COUNT(DISTINCT t.user_id) tender_number FROM ( SELECT temp.user_id, temp.client FROM ht_borrow_tender temp
UNION ALL SELECT temp.user_id, temp.client FROM ht_product_list temp
UNION ALL SELECT temp.user_id, temp.client FROM ht_debt_plan_accede temp
) t GROUP BY t.client ) tender_number
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT temp.client AS client, SUM(temp.money) AS recharge_price FROM ht_account_recharge temp WHERE temp.`status` = 1
GROUP BY temp.client ) recharge_price on recharge_price.client=tender_number.client
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT temp.client AS client, SUM(temp.account) amount FROM ht_borrow_tender temp INNER JOIN ht_borrow borrow ON borrow.borrow_nid = temp.borrow_nid AND borrow.project_type <> 8
AND temp.accede_order_id IS NULL
GROUP BY temp.client ) hzt_tender_price on hzt_tender_price.client=recharge_price.client
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT temp.client AS client, SUM(temp.account) amount FROM ht_borrow_tender temp INNER JOIN ht_borrow borrow ON borrow.borrow_nid = temp.borrow_nid AND borrow.`status` IN ( 1, 3 ) AND borrow.project_type = 8
GROUP BY temp.client ) hxf_tender_price on hxf_tender_price.client=hzt_tender_price.client
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT temp.client AS client, SUM(temp.amount) amount FROM ht_product_list temp
GROUP BY temp.client ) htl_tender_price on htl_tender_price.client=hxf_tender_price.client LEFT JOIN ( SELECT temp.client AS client, SUM(temp.accede_account) amount FROM ht_debt_plan_accede temp
GROUP BY temp.client ) htj_tender_price on htj_tender_price.client=htl_tender_price.client LEFT JOIN (
select ss.client,sum(sumAcount) amount from ( SELECT accede.client,sum(temp.account) sumAcount FROM ht_hjh_accede accede inner JOIN ht_borrow_tender temp ON accede.accede_order_id = temp.accede_order_id
GROUP BY accede.client union SELECT accede.client, sum(hjhTen.assign_pay) sumAcount FROM ht_hjh_accede accede INNER JOIN ht_hjh_debt_credit_tender hjhTen on accede.accede_order_id = hjhTen.assign_plan_order_id
AND FROM_UNIXTIME( hjhTen.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) >= #{timeStartSrch}
AND FROM_UNIXTIME( hjhTen.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) <= #{timeEndSrch}
GROUP BY accede.client ) ss GROUP BY ss.client ) hjh_tender_price on hjh_tender_price.client=htj_tender_price.client LEFT JOIN (
SELECT temp.client AS client, sum(temp.assign_capital) amount FROM ht_credit_tender temp
GROUP BY temp.client )hzr_tender_price on hzr_tender_price.client=hjh_tender_price.client
